alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 10:36AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Perry and northwestern Morgan Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1036 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bremen, or 7 miles east of Lancaster, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Lexington, Somerset, Perry State Forest, Thornport, Crooksville, Thornville, Junction City and Glenford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
